name: niwango.js - An Execution Engine for Niwango, Programmable via Video Comments
description: This is an interpreter engine that executes the programming language Niwango (Niwango Script) in a web browser. It provides a time-sequenced processing system and returns the rendering results. The primary goal is to enable the re-execution of works previously created with this language, with the ultimate aim of revitalizing the Niwango community.

video.name: niwango.js - An Execution Engine for Niwango, Programmable via Video Comments

It provides a time-sequenced processing system and returns the rendering results. The primary goal is to enable the re-execution of works previously created with this language, with the ultimate aim of revitalizing the Niwango community.

educationalLevel: Primary and Secondary Education (Ages 17 and under)
